attributes.action: not increase the marriage visa age from 18 to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People are allowed to get married at the age of 16, so theoretically if I fall in love with someone from abroad and get married to them, they can't live with me until five years later?! This law just doesn't make sense and seems too far right to be a labour party. 

I am a british born UK resident, I am law abiding, contribute to society, do voluntary work, work full-time, am a university student, do not claim any benefits whatsoever and pay national insurance and tax. So why would the Government want to ruin my life by making me wait another three years to allow my wife to come to this country (p.s. I will be paying for all my wifes expenses anyway, so I don't see how this effects our economy in any way)

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
